abilities.name: Psychological Saboteur
abilities.rule:
While an enemy unit is within 12" of this model, if that unit is Battle-shocked:
■ Each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
■ Each time a friendly **TYRANIDS** model makes an attack that targets that unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Feeder Tendrils
abilities.rule: Each time this model destroys an enemy **CHARACTER** model, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Neural Disruption
abilities.rule: In your Command phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

unit_composition:
■ **1 Neurolictor**

**This model is equipped with:** piercing claws and talons.
